projects.title: Metal Dental Clinic Website
projects.bodyText:
- Website designed to promote the brand and enhance its online presence.
 - Facilitates customers in scheduling dental appointments seamlessly through an intuitive interface.
 - Empowers doctors and staff to efficiently manage appointments and receive real-time email notifications for customer bookings.

projects.title: Vaccination Website
projects.bodyText:
- Built with inspiration from the VNVC website, integrating Google Gemini, Momo, and Facebook.
 - Supports customers in viewing vaccines, booking/managing appointments, and online payments.
 - Enables doctors/staff to manage appointments, vaccines, and payments.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website built using React, showcasing projects and skills with a modern, responsive design.
 - Fully customizable and dynamic, allowing seamless updates to data, images, and content for flexible personalization.
- Includes Dark Mode support to enhance user experience.

projects.title: Laptop Shop Website
projects.bodyText:
- Website crafted to promote a laptop brand and strengthen its online visibility.
 - Enables customers to browse laptops, place orders, and complete payments through an intuitive interface.
 - Empowers staff to manage orders, track inventory, and receive real-time email notifications for customer purchases.

projects.title: Learning English Website
projects.bodyText:
- Website designed to enhance English learning and boost its online educational presence.
 - Enables users to learn English, take online practice tests, and create custom quizzes or lessons through an intuitive interface.
 - Empowers instructors to manage courses, monitor user progress, and receive real-time email notifications for test submissions.

projects.title: Admin Dashboard
projects.bodyText:
- Dashboard website crafted to streamline data management and enhance its online utility.
 - Enables users to access, customize, and reuse dashboard structures through an intuitive interface.
 - Empowers administrators to monitor performance, update layouts, and receive real-time email notifications for system changes.
